title: Loan Application Portal
description: Digital self-service channel for customers to apply for personal and home loans online.

userStories.title: Application Form Submission
userStories.description: Enables customers to submit loan applications digitally for supported loan types.

tasks.title: Submit Loan Application
tasks.description: As a customer, I want to fill out and submit a loan application online so that I can apply for a personal or home loan conveniently.
acceptance_criteria:
Given a logged-in customer
When they complete the application form and submit
Then the application is saved and confirmation is shown

[Edge] Given an application is missing required fields
When the customer tries to submit
Then an error message indicating the missing fields is displayed

[Negative] Given a loan product is not supported
When a customer selects it
Then the product is not available for application

userStories.title: Document Upload & Verification
userStories.description: Allows users to upload supporting documents and leverages OCR for automated verification.

tasks.title: Upload Supporting Documents
tasks.description: As a customer, I want to upload my ID and income documents so that the bank can verify my eligibility automatically.
acceptance_criteria:
Given a loan application
When I upload valid documents
Then the system accepts and verifies them using OCR

[Edge] Given an uploaded document is unreadable or corrupted
When OCR attempts verification
Then the system flags the document for manual review and informs the user

[Negative] Given a user uploads an unsupported file type
When they attempt to submit
Then an error message specifying supported formats is shown

userStories.title: Application Status Tracking
userStories.description: Allows customers to check the real-time status of their loan applications.

tasks.title: View Application Status
tasks.description: As a customer, I want to track my application status so that I know when my loan will be approved.
acceptance_criteria:
Given a submitted loan application
When I log in and view the status page
Then the current status (e.g., Under Review, Approved, Rejected) is displayed with timestamps

[Edge] Given no existing applications
When I visit the status page
Then I see an empty state message and a 'Start New Application' CTA

[Negative] Given I am not logged in
When I try to access the application status
Then I see a 401 Unauthorized error

title: Loan Management Dashboard
description: Internal system for Loan Officers and Underwriters to review, process and manage loan applications.

userStories.title: Application Queue & Assignment
userStories.description: Displays pending loan applications and supports assignment to available officers/underwriters.

tasks.title: View and Assign Applications
tasks.description: As a loan officer, I want to view a queue of pending applications and assign them for review so that applications are handled efficiently.
acceptance_criteria:
Given multiple pending loan applications
When I open the dashboard
Then I see the list with status, applicant details, and assign options

[Edge] Given an application has already been assigned
When I attempt to assign it
Then the assignment is prevented and a notification shown

[Negative] Given I am not authenticated
When I access the dashboard
Then I receive a 401 Unauthorized response

userStories.title: Manual Review and Override
userStories.description: Enables officers to manually review flagged applications or override automated decisions.

tasks.title: Override Automated Decisions
tasks.description: As an underwriter, I want to manually review and override system decisions on applications so that exceptions and edge cases are handled correctly.
acceptance_criteria:
Given a flagged application
When I open the details and select 'Override'
Then I can provide a justification and finalize the decision

[Edge] Given no justification is entered for an override
When I attempt to submit
Then the system prevents submission and requests justification

[Negative] Given I lack override permissions
When I attempt to override a decision
Then I receive a 'Permission Denied' message

title: Automated Document Verification
description: Automates validation of uploaded documents using integrated OCR and triggers manual review on exceptions.

userStories.title: OCR Integration
userStories.description: Integrates document OCR service for automatic extraction and verification of provided documents.

tasks.title: Automatic Document Verification
tasks.description: As the system, I want to process uploaded documents via OCR so that loan processing is expedited and manual entry is minimized.
acceptance_criteria:
Given a batch of uploaded documents
When OCR processing is completed
Then validated results are stored and flagged exceptions are sent for manual review

[Edge] Given OCR times out or produces low-confidence results
When verifying documents
Then the system triggers manual review and logs the event

[Negative] Given document verification fails due to API unavailability
When initiating OCR
Then a fallback manual verification workflow is triggered

title: Credit Check Integration
description: Automates credit scoring of applicants by integrating with Credit Bureau API.

userStories.title: Credit Score Retrieval
userStories.description: Fetches and displays applicant credit score during loan evaluation.

tasks.title: Retrieve Credit Score
tasks.description: As a loan officer, I want the system to automatically fetch applicant credit scores so that credit assessments are consistent and efficient.
acceptance_criteria:
Given valid applicant details
When I review the application
Then the system automatically displays the credit score from the bureau API

[Edge] Given the bureau API returns incomplete data
When fetching the credit score
Then the system displays a warning and prompts for manual verification

[Negative] Given the API is unavailable
When attempting to retrieve the score
Then the system logs the error and informs the user that manual credit check is required

title: Notifications and Reminders
description: Automates communication to applicants and internal users about application status updates and required actions.

userStories.title: Email & SMS Notifications
userStories.description: Sends automated status notifications and reminders at key stages of the process.

tasks.title: Send Status Notifications
tasks.description: As a customer, I want to receive updates via email and SMS at each stage of my loan application so that I am always informed of progress and required actions.
acceptance_criteria:
Given my application status changes (e.g., submitted, under review, approved, rejected)
When the status is updated
Then the system sends the appropriate notification via my chosen channels

[Edge] Given user has opted out of notifications
When status changes
Then the system does not send a message

[Negative] Given invalid contact details on file
When a notification is triggered
Then an error is logged and the notification is not sent

title: Reporting and Analytics
description: Provides system usage, compliance and performance analytics to business users.

userStories.title: Loan Processing Reports
userStories.description: Displays data related to application processing times, manual interventions and customer satisfaction.

tasks.title: View Loan Processing Metrics
tasks.description: As a business analyst, I want to access metrics on loan processing times, automation rates, and CSAT so that I can monitor objectives and compliance.
acceptance_criteria:
Given I am authorized
When I access the reporting dashboard
Then I can view updated metrics including automation percentage and CSAT scores

[Edge] Given no loan applications processed in a period
When viewing reports
Then system displays 'No Data Available' for relevant charts

[Negative] Given I am not authenticated
When I try to access reporting
Then access is denied with a 401 error
